hero.title: Smart Irrigation
hero.subtitle: Management Made Simple
hero.description: Optimize your irrigation systems with intelligent scripts and models. Save water, time, and resources with our advanced management platform.

features.title: Features
features.heading: Everything You Need to Optimize Irrigation
features.description: Our platform provides powerful tools to manage, monitor, and optimize your irrigation systems.

smartScripts.title: Smart Scripts
smartScripts.description: Create and manage intelligent irrigation scripts that adapt to changing conditions.

advancedModels.title: Advanced Models
advancedModels.description: Develop sophisticated irrigation models based on soil, weather, and crop data.

dataAnalytics.title: Data Analytics
dataAnalytics.description: Gain insights from comprehensive analytics and reporting on water usage and efficiency.

teamCollaboration.title: Team Collaboration
teamCollaboration.description: Work together with your team to manage and optimize irrigation systems.

securePlatform.title: Secure Platform
securePlatform.description: Your data is protected with enterprise-grade security and encryption.

waterConservation.title: Water Conservation
waterConservation.description: Save water and reduce costs with intelligent irrigation management.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.heading: Trusted by Professionals Worldwide
testimonials.description: See what our customers are saying about our irrigation management platform.

testimonial1.name: John Doe
testimonial1.quote: This platform has revolutionized how we manage irrigation on our farm. We've reduced water usage by 30% while improving crop yields.

testimonial2.name: Jane Smith
testimonial2.quote: The ability to create custom irrigation models and scripts has been a game-changer for our operations. Highly recommended!

testimonial3.name: Robert Johnson
testimonial3.quote: We've been using this platform for our vineyard irrigation for over a year now. The water savings and improved grape quality speak for themselves.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.heading: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that's right for your irrigation management needs.

cta.heading: Ready to Optimize Your Irrigation?
cta.description: Join thousands of professionals who are saving water and improving crop yields with our platform.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.welcome: Welcome to your irrigation management dashboard.
